metadata.synopsis: This AD happens when you damage nightdome and bring it below 75%.
metadata.how_to_trigger: 1. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States  - Halsin at camp with Spirit2. Use Debug Book - Set Quest Flags - Act 2 - GLO - Lifting the curse - Quest States - Oliver Fled to Town - teleports Oliver to the plaza in the Town and readies him for a fight. Also teleports you to the plaza as well, you'll only need to approach Oliver to start combat.3. Attack the Nightdome and reduce its HP to less than 75%.

0.speaker: Oliver
0.text: Stop that! You're supposed to be playing, not breaking things!
0.context: NodeContext: Angry (player is trying to break through a protective magic dome guarding Oliver)
